about: Create a report to help us improve

assignees: ''

---

**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior. If bug is in GUI, please describe the steps. If the bug is an error with the API, then **please include a script that reproduces the bug** when possible.

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**Installation (please complete the following information):**
 - OS: [e.g. macOS]
 - Python Version [e.g. 3.14]
 - HNN-Core version [e.g. v0.5.0]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.

**Code of Conduct**
Please abide by our [Code of Conduct, which can be found here](https://github.com/jonescompneurolab/hnn-core/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). Failure to do so will result in the consequences explained in that document.
